project_plan.name: CSV Data Analysis Tool
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that reads a CSV file and performs basic statistical analysis by calculating the mean, median, and mode for specified numerical columns.

task.name: Implement functionality to read CSV files and extract relevant columns
Implement mean calculation for specified numerical columns
Implement median calculation for specified numerical columns
Implement mode calculation for specified numerical columns
Write tests for the reading of the CSV file and calculation methods (mean, median, mode)
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
